Package GUI

package GUI
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    BattleScreen
    Battle screen where player fights chosen opponent.
    GameOverScreen
    Game over screen shows player score, days passed, and options to restart or end game.
    ItemScreen
    Item screen shows players inventory and team that allows items to be used out of battle.
    MainScreen
    The main screen of game, shows name, gold, current day of game.
    SetupScreen
    Entry point to the GUI application.
    ShopScreen
    Shop screen allows player to buy and sell items/monsters.
    TeamScreen
    Screen that shows all monsters in the team and allows player to rename monster.
